Description: ADC Telecommunications Inc. agreed to pay the United States $1 million to resolve allegations that the company submitted false claims to federal agencies when it sold telecommunications goods manufactured in countries prohibited by the Trade Agreements Act.

Private Litigation Case Title: In Re: ADC Telecommunications, et al

Description: Tyco Electronics Printed Circuit Group, a subsidiary of Tyco International, agreed to pay $2 million penalty and spend $2.4 million for environmental improvements, in settlement of allegations it violated the Clean Water Act at facilities in Manchester and Stafford Springs, illegally operating a system to bypass monitoring equipment.
